project_plan.name: Text-Based Adventure Game in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a simple text-based adventure game where the player can navigate through different rooms, pick up items, view their inventory, and encounter simple challenges.

task.name: Set up the game structure and main loop
Create different room classes for the game world
Implement simple challenges or puzzles for the player to encounter
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
